name: LastStand
description:
Made for Brackeys Gamejam 2021.2

Controls:
WSAD - Moving
Left Mouse button - Shooting

Left Shift -  Dash, use it to go trough bullets unharmed or push enemies away

Last Stand is a bullet-hell type of game, where you are making split second decisions, which decide if you survive or die.
Disclaimer:
Music in the game was not made be me, here are the authors

Jimmy Fontanez - Dub Hub
